main event: Observer sighted a bright blue flash of lights for 2-3 seconds near Buckley ANG Base.
interesting points: The observer was temporarily blinded by the brightness of the flash., The exact location of the flash (airborne or ground) is unknown., It is unclear whether the flash was stationary or moving., The observation was made on a clear night., The observer went through the house to the front yard during the observation, causing the light to disappear.
witness description: Mr. 59, considered reliable, residing in Aurora, Colorado.
